Definition.WordDefinition: Noonday, TX (city, FIPS 51756) Location: 32.24386 N, 95.39764 W Population (1990): 466 (181 housing units) Area: 5.2 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Noonday \Noon"day`\, n. Midday; twelve o'clock in the day; noon. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Noonday \Noon"day`\, a. Of or pertaining to midday; meridional; as, the noonday heat; only mad dogs and Englishmen go out in the noonday sun. ``Noonday walks.'' --Addison. [1913 Webster +PJC]
noonday n : the middle of the day [syn: {noon}, {twelve noon}, {high noon}, {midday}, {noontide}]
